name: Slot Raider
description:
Gameplay

You are a gambling adventure, but in this adventure it may cost your life! Spin to win.. or lose your life...

Associated w/ Game Jam - Juice Jam II

Rules
  • 5 G per Spin
  • Match 3+ Symbols for Payout (some Symbols aren't worth squat).
Store
  • Potion - Press [1] to buy - Immediate Full Health
  • Shield - Press [2] to buy - Gain 1x Shield (blocks 1x hit)
Payout Table SymbolMatch 3Match 4 Match 5Match 8+
+5 G+10 G+25 G+50 G
+10 G+20 G+50 G+100 G
+25 G+50 G+125 G+250 G+50 G+100 G+250 G+500 G+10 HP+20 HP+50 HP+100 HP1 Shield1 Shield1 Shield1 Shield-10 HP-20 HP-50 HPDEATH-20 HP-40 HPDEATHDEATH Controls Title Screen [SPACE] - Play
[Q] - Quit GameGame Screen [SPACE] - Spin
[ESC]   - Pause ScreenGame Over Screen [SPACE] - Continue Credits
  • H.U.M.P. - Helper Utilities for a Multitude of Problems (for Love2D)
  • Love2D - a framework for making 2D games.
  • Cainos - Art
  • Shapeforms - Audio
  • Lornn - Background Art
  • CodeManu - Juicy Animations
Thank You!!
